issue.title: Ad leftovers on bilibili.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [X] Browser version is up-to-date; - [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version uBlock Origin 1.48.2 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? www.bilibili.com ### What filters do you have enabled? AdGuard Chinese filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. On www.bilibili.com, the current filter rules: ``` bilibili.com#?#.bili-video-card > div.bili-video-card__wrap > a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url]:not([data-target-url*=".bili"]):upward(2) bilibili.com#?#.bili-video-card:has(> .bili-video-card__wrap > .bili-video-card__info > .bili-video-card__info--right > .bili-video-card__info--tit > a > [class^="bili-video-card__info--ad"]) bilibili.com#?#.eva-extension-feed-body > div:not([class], [id]):has(> .bili-video-card > .bili-video-card__wrap > .bili-video-card__info > .bili-video-card__info--right > .bili-video-card__info--tit > a > [class^="bili-video-card__info--ad"]) bilibili.com#?#.bili-video-card:has(> .bili-video-card__wrap > .bili-video-card__info > .bili-video-card__info--right > .bili-video-card__info--tit > a > .bili-video-card__info--creative-img) bilibili.com##.bili-video-card__wrap > a[href^="http"]:not([href*=".bilibili.com/"]) bilibili.com##a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url*="gaoneng.bilibili.com"] bilibili.com##a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url*="gaoneng.bilibili.com"] + .bili-video-card__info bilibili.com##a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url]:not([data-target-url*=".bili"]) bilibili.com##a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"][data-target-url]:not([data-target-url*=".bili"]) + .bili-video-card__info ``` from `AdGuard Chinese filter` produces ad leftovers occupying space (as in the screenshots 1,2). Also, rules 2-4 do not work with the new version of the website. This can be fixed by adding the following rule (with the previous ones removed). ``` bilibili.com##.bili-video-card__wrap > a[href*="cm.bilibili.com"]:upward(.bili-video-card) ``` 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1: Previous rules enabled, DOM inspector on
Screenshot 2: Previous rules enabled, DOM inspector off
Screenshot 3: Suggested rule enabled, previous rule disabled, DOM inspector on
Screenshot 4: Suggested rule enabled, previous rule disabled, DOM inspector off
### Privacy - [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dubox.drive](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.dubox.drive) ### Comment Username: @Chimpufernandez > HTTPS filtering for this app is already enabled. App may not show the ad immediately upon opening. In my case after minimising it & using any other app for 30 secs and then maximising the Terabox app again will show the ad. > Updating your filters seems to remove the ad maybe once but when the app is opened again after closing (using greenify) you can see the ad after a few seconds. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
@Alex-302 
As per instructions I applied the rule ||biddingmax.apse.trk.rixserv.com^ along with @@||biddingmax.apse.trk.rixserv.com^$app=com.dubox.drive, after clearing the cache of terabox app ad vanished only that time.

After an hour when I used the app ad returned. So I spent the next hour filtering out suspicious entries in the filtering log & one by one added them as rules, each time clearing out the cache & reopening the app every single time.

At the best in few earlier attempts only blank white box was visible so kept going further adding new rules. Finally now a black banner inside the white box is visible that hasn't changed ( see screenshot). 

To conclude Ad box is still visible. Below are al the extra rules I have added. Terabox app itself is working fine.

- ||terabox.com/api^$app=com.dubox.drive
- ||terabox.apse.svr.rixengine.com^$app=com.dubox.drive
- ||v-jp.nephobox.com^$app=com.dubox.drive
- ||dns://terabox.apse.svr.rixengine.com^
- ||global-staticplat.cdn.bcebos.com^$app=com.dubox.drive

![Screenshot_20230401-132446.png](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52345784/229337660-6c8a2c65-c09a-4df1-b810-527cc7ff519a.png)
